summary_md: Finland, in the year 2024, has a per capita GDP of 44,855 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 1.57% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 8.26% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 81.69 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 93.50% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is at 41.55% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Finland's economy is characterized by a per capita GDP of 44,855 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 41.55% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Finland shows an unemployment rate of 8.26% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS), indicating a relatively stable employment environment.
sections.digital_md: With an internet usage rate of 93.50% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Finland demonstrates a high level of digital connectivity among its population.
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Finland is 81.69 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), reflecting the country's commitment to health and well-being.
